newsitem.title: USA: Investor holds 5.4 pct Halsey Drug stake.
newsitem.headline: Investor holds 5.4 pct Halsey Drug stake.

text.p: William Priest, a New York-based investor, said Friday he holds a 5.4 percent stake or 540,500 common shares in Halsey Drug Co Inc.
In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, Priest said he holds the stake for investment purposes.
Priest is chief executive officer of BEA Associates, a New York based investment management firm.
